Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge masterND into using-MAUI branch

- Resolved merge conflict in TShape.cs for MAUI Color compatibility
- Added System.Numerics for Vector3 support in both MAUI and non-MAUI builds
- Fixed CreatePalette\(\) to use Color.FromRgba for MAUI
- Updated MainPage.xaml.cs to use 1D Cubies array \(N-D support\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
